Class PathUtils

java.lang.Object
nl.hva.elections.xml.utils.PathUtils
public class PathUtils extends Object
A helper-class used for traversing a directory structure which contains the Dutch election data.

      public PathUtils()

  • Method Details

    • findFilesToScan

      public static List<Path> findFilesToScan(String sourceLocation, String prefix) throws IOException
      Starting from @{code sourceLocation} searches the folder and any folder contained in it for files with the specified prefix.
      Parameters:
      sourceLocation - the starting point for the search.
      prefix - files beginning with this prefix are included in the resulting list.
      Returns:
      A List containing all the files with the specified prefix find in this folder or any folder contained in starting folder.
      Throws:
      IOException - in case something went wrong while traversing the folders.

    • getResourcePath

      public static String getResourcePath(String resourceName)
      Transforms a resourceName into an absolute path of that resource. If it does not exist at the expected location it tries to fall back to a folder called data-files or Downloads.
      Parameters:
      resourceName - the resource to locate.
      Returns:
      a fully qualified absolute path to the resource.
